item.title: How to Reinstall Yuzu & Ryujinx While Keeping Your Save Files
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
How to Reinstall Yuzu & Ryujinx While Keeping Your Save Files

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to completely reinstall Yuzu and Ryujinx without losing your precious save files. Detailed guide with screenshots and backup methods.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04
